sections.name: Unbabel
description: Full-Stack become Tech Lead Engineer.
Currently working on supporting internal operations team, developing processes and tools to help improving quality of translations and reduce cost.
Previously part of team that architected and implemented the new portal for Unbabel Customers.
Also worked as Service Engineer, onboarding new customers into Unbabel ecosystem, developing custom software and processes to accomodate their needs

sections.name: Dezine
description: Internship as Full-Stack Software Developer.
Mainly developing frontend app to display clothing products, in a 'pinterest-like' board.
Also developed backend API to serve as BFF for main products page.

sections.name: Vitopal Informatica Lda
description: Internship as Systems Technician and IT clerk.
Setting up servers and networks in Windows Server and Ubuntu Server.
Also involved in upgrading and troubleshooting the company systems.

sections.name: Instituto Superior Tecnico
description: Bachelor's Degree in [Information Systems and Computer Science Engineering](https://fenix.tecnico.ulisboa.pt/cursos/leic-a)
Areas of interests include C++, Java, Python, Node and Git.

sections.name: Escola Secundária de Benavente
description: Curso Prof. de Tecnico de Gestão e Programação de Sistemas Informáticos.
Where first learn how to code. Mostly C, C++ and C# projects.
First web projects written in PHP.
Have been going to [Pixel's Camp Competition](https://pixels.camp/) @LX Factory, Lisbon since 2016.
Participated in the last two years of [Codebits](https://codebits.eu/?lang=pt) @ Lisbon, Portugal.

Organized [Unbabel Hackathon 2015](https://blog.unbabel.com/2015/03/04/the-results-are-in-unbabels-first-hackathon-winners/) @ [SINFO XXII](http://sinfo.org/) [Startup Rush Hackathon](https://blog.unbabel.com/2015/02/26/unbabel-sponsors-sinfos-startup-rush-hackathon/).
Bash, Python, Ruby, Elixir, CSS, HTML, Javascript
Django, Flask, Ruby on Rails, Phoenix, jQuery, Vue.js, Hugo, Jekyll
PyCharm, Docker, Git (Github & Gitlab), Heroku, GCP, AWS, Netlify
Cooking, TV shows, Reading, Gym, Surfing.
